input.sentences: the bridge looked as gorgeous as could be .
the invitations will be saved forever .
the special day was finally upon us .
they all had such a great time together .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful spring day that Cheryl was walked down the aisle to marry the love of her life.
She'd planned for this event all her life and it was finally happening.
Marrying this guy she just met off Tinder was the best idea ever, or so she thought.
But her friends secretly didn't think it was that great of an idea, even though they showed up and pretended they did.
One girl in the crowd was more judgemental than the others because she had crushed on the groom.
